Secondary Boot Loader
IMPORTANT NOTE
The interfaces defined in this package are bound to change. Release notes/user guide list the additional limitation/restriction of this module/interfaces. See also TI Disclaimer.

Secondary Boot Loader Library(SBL Lib) contains the interfaces that are generic and can be used by any higher level application including SBL application. Secondary Boot Loader Utility Library (SBL Utils) contains the interfaces that are used by SBL application for communicating with various IO peripherals and boot media. SBL application contains the bootloader application that initializes the SoC, loads the application image and boots the slave cores.

Also refer to top level user guide for detailed features, limitations and usage description.

  • SBL Library
    SBL Lib contains the SBL Library layer for all platforms. SBL Library can be further divided into following:
    • SBL Common Lib (See SBL Lib)
      SBL Common Library provides interfaces that are common across different platforms.
    • SBL Board Lib (See SBL Board Lib)
      SBL Board Library provides the board related interfaces like pin mux APIs, etc.
    • SBL Config Lib (See SBL Config Lib)
      SBL Library Config contains compile time configurable parameters of TDAxxx SBL. This can be used to port SBL to custom use case.
    • SBL TDA2xx Lib (See SBL TDA2xx Lib)
      SBL TDA2xx Lib contains the interfaces present in the Secondary Bootloader(SBL) Library valid for TDA2xx SOC family (TDA2xx and TDA2Ex platform).
    • SBL TDA3xx Lib (See SBL TDA3xx Lib)
      SBL TDA3xx Lib contains the interfaces present in the Secondary Bootloader(SBL) Library valid for TDA3xx platform.
  • SBL Utility Library
    SBL Utils contains the SBL Utility layer interfaces for all platforms. SBL Utils can be further divided into following:
    • SBL Common Utils (See SBL Common Utilities)
      SBL Common Utils contains the SBL Utility layer common for all platforms.
    • SBL DDR Utils (See SBL DDR Configuration Utilities)
      SBL DDR Utils contains the SBL Utility layer specific to TDAxx DDR configuration.
    • SBL TDA2xx Utils (See TDA2xx SBL Utilities)
      SBL TDA2xx Utils contains the SBL Utility layer specific to TDA2xx SOC family.
    • SBL TDA3xx Utils (See TDA3xx SBL Utilities)
      SBL TDA3xx Utils contains the SBL Utility layer specific to TDA3xx Platform.
    • SBL I2C Utils (See TDA3xx SBL I2C Utilities)
      SBL I2C Utils contains the SBL Utility layer specific to TDA3xx platform needed for I2C communication.
  • NOR Flash Library
    • Nor Flash Lib (See NOR Flash Library)
      Nor Flash Library contains the interfaces for accessing the NOR Flash.
  • QSPI Flash Library
    • QSPI Flash Lib (See QSPI Flash Library)
      QSPI Flash Library contains the interfaces for accessing the Flash using QSPI
